## Quaternion class

Class used to store quaternion data [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quaternion](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quaternion) [http://doc.babylonjs.com/features/position,\_rotation,\_scaling](http://doc.babylonjs.com/features/position,_rotation,_scaling)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Quaternion 
```

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [eulerAngles](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.eulerangles.md) |  | <code>Vector3</code> | Sets the euler angle representation of the rotation. |
|  [Identity](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.identity.md) | <code>static</code> | <code>Quaternion</code> | Creates an identity quaternion |
|  [length](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.length.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets length of current quaternion |
|  [lengthSquared](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.lengthsquared.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Gets length of current quaternion |
|  [normalized](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.normalized.md) |  | <code>Quaternion</code> | Converts this quaternion to one with the same orientation but with a magnitude of 1. |
|  [w](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.w.md) |  | <code>number</code> | defines the fourth component (1.0 by default) |
|  [x](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.x.md) |  | <code>number</code> | defines the first component (0 by default) |
|  [y](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.y.md) |  | <code>number</code> | defines the second component (0 by default) |
|  [z](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.z.md) |  | <code>number</code> | defines the third component (0 by default) |

|  [RotationQuaternionFromAxisToRef(axis1, axis2, axis3, ref)](./decentraland-ecs.quaternion.rotationquaternionfromaxistoref.md) | <code>static</code> | Creates a rotation value to reach the target (axis1, axis2, axis3) orientation as a rotated XYZ system (axis1, axis2 and axis3 are normalized during this operation) and stores it in the target quaternion |
